title: Mastery 6 & 7 Colors are Flipped?
body:
The purple banner looks way more prestigious (royalty) than the blue banner, but it's the blue banner that is the higher level.

The blue banner could at least use a brightness bump.

replies.body: I like the way Mastery level 6 looks more too.

Agreed, Purple is better than Blue - never upgrade! 

Lulu knows what I'm talking about.
Spamming mastery 7 should shoot a blinding light in game.

its about color order. red, into purple, into blue. purple is the color between blue and red.

Naw man.

Because the mastery color before red is tan... Not exactly a transition.

Anyway... pretty sure players care less about color transition and more about the mastery reward being depicted as more prestigious than the one before it.

Bronze(1), Bronze(2), Bronze(3), Bronze Promos(4), Gold 5 (the gem in middle of gold 5 icon is red, gold around), 6 is Plat, 7 Is Diamond.

Just a theory
